name: Margherita Pizza
description: Classic Italian pizza topped with tomato sauce, fresh mozzarella cheese, and basil leaves.

name: Pepperoni Pizza
description: Traditional pizza topped with spicy pepperoni slices and melted cheese.

name: Vegetarian Pizza
description: A delicious medley of fresh vegetables such as bell peppers, mushrooms, onions, and olives on a bed of tomato sauce and cheese.

name: Hawaiian Pizza
description: A controversial yet beloved combination of ham, pineapple, and cheese on a thin crust.

name: BBQ Chicken Pizza
description: Tender grilled chicken pieces marinated in barbecue sauce, topped with red onions, and smothered in melted cheese.

name: Mushroom Pizza
description: Sliced mushrooms sautéed in garlic butter and herbs, generously spread over a cheesy base.

name: Four Cheese Pizza
description: A cheese lover's dream featuring a blend of mozzarella, cheddar, parmesan, and gorgonzola cheeses atop a crispy crust.

name: Meat Lover's Pizza
description: Packed with a hearty assortment of meat toppings including pepperoni, sausage, ham, and bacon.

name: Spinach and Feta Pizza
description: A light and flavorful option featuring sautéed spinach, tangy feta cheese, and a hint of garlic.

name: Buffalo Chicken Pizza
description: Spicy buffalo chicken pieces combined with creamy ranch dressing and melted cheese on a crispy crust.
